parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: The serial or network port the opentherm gateway is connected to. In case of a serial port, the value should either be a port name like 'COM1' (Windows) or a device file like '/dev/ttyS0' (Unix). When using the serial to network converter, the format should be something like '192.168.1.100:1001' where the first part is the IP-address or host name to connect to and the second part is the port number.
